TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionMethodItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示与从 派生的类中的方法关联的智能标记面板项。

span.span: Represents a smart tag panel item that is associated with a method in a class derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示智能标记面板中的各个项。The class represents individual items in a smart tag panel. 此类型的项显示为一个活动用户界面元素（如超链接），该元素在派生自的类中调用程序员提供的方法 。An item of this type is displayed as an active user interface element, such as a hyperlink, that invokes a programmer-supplied method in a class derived from . 项和方法之间的关联通过属性的值进行维护 。The association between the item and the method is maintained through the value of the property. 此项调用的方法不能接受参数，也不能返回值。The method that this item invokes must neither take parameters nor return a value. 通过调用类的方法，将各个面板项关联起来以形成面板 。Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by a call to the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对象的集合 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 有关实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅 [如何：将智能标记附加到 Windows 窗体组件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171830(v=vs.120))。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171830(v=vs.120)). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions/CS/designeractions.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions/VB/designeractions.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `includeAsDesignerVerb` 参数设置为 `true` ，则此项也被视为 ; 因此，它将被添加到组件的设计时快捷菜单中。If the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter is set to `true`, then this item is also considered a ; therefore, it will be added to the component's design-time shortcut menu. 在 Visual Studio 中，还会将命令添加到属性窗口的 " **属性** " 窗格中。In Visual Studio, a command will also be added to the **Attributes** pane of the Properties window. 可以通过设计器的 "集合" 属性访问设计器谓词的列表 。A list of designer verbs can be accessed through the designer's collection property. 构造函数将 和属性设置 为 `null` 。The constructor sets the and properties to `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性初始化为 `true` ，则还可以通过相应的设计器谓词事件调用关联的方法。If the property is initialized to `true`, the associated method can also be invoked through the corresponding designer verb event.

summary.span: 获取与此 关联的方法的名称。

A that contains the name of the associated method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定从类派生的类中 应将项绑定到的属性。The property specifies which property, in the class derived from the class, that the item should be bound to. 当程序员通过用户界面与面板项进行交互 (UI) 时，将设置此关联的属性。When the programmer interacts with the panel item through the user interface (UI), this associated property will be set. 绑定方法既不应采用参数也不返回值。The bound method should neither take parameters nor return a value. 此属性是在构造函数中设置的。This property is set in the constructor. 它区分大小写。It is case-sensitive.

summary.span: 获取或设置为当前面板提供 对象的组件。

span.span: Gets or sets a component that contributes its objects to the current panel.

value.span: 提供对象的组件，它应有提供项的关联设计器。

span.span: The contributing component, which should have an associated designer that supplies items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许其他组件将其智能标记面板项借出到当前列表。The property allows another component to lend its smart tag panel items to the current list. 例如，用户控件可能会从其构成标准控件之一聚合项。For example, a user control might aggregate the items from one of its constituent standard controls. 此属性与属性结合使用 。This property works in conjunction with the property.

related.span: Windows 窗体的设计器命令和 DesignerAction 对象模型
